tag.author: 52529054@N06

description._content:
Caption: Ralph Imhoff (right) chairman of the Board of Directors of the Mennonite Home for the Aged, Eureka Ill., and Clayton Sutter, superintendent, inspect the panel of the fire detection system being installed at the Home. The system indicates the area and floor on which an abnormal rise in temperature occurs and automatically sounds an alarm in the building and at the telephone office. The operator at the switch board will immediately call the fire department..

Citation: Mennonite Board of Missions. Photographs. Illinois, Eureka, Home for the Aged, 1950-1956. IV-10-7.2 Box 3 Folder 72. Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana.
